thread.title: Dale

author: Dale
title: Dale
text: Appreciated the professional/friendly approach to assist with purchasing precious metals from Goldline. Am a novice when it comes to understanding the ins/outs for purchasing precious metals. Both Gino and Shelly provided a concise and simple approach to purchase precious metals. I look forward to working with Shelly in the future. Did some up front homework to check out Goldline's credibility. Findings were all positive including Glen Beck's video about Goldline. I would highly recommend this company to those who are looking to invest in precious metals...they are transparent and show all up front/overhead costs. I appreciated their approach and found it to be refreshing.
